name: Needle Hatena
description:
This is an IWBTG fangame. If you don't know what those are, check out fangam.es/intro.

A precision platformer tribute to Flipnote Studio, made by a small team of various different creators. Play a wide variety of difficult stages in any order, each being different than the last. It also has wearable hats, for some reason.

Credits are listed in the readme file contained with the game's folder, and in the game itself.
